subject: anniversary
body:
![IMG_9634 2.PNG](/letters/images/118.jpg)

i'm thankful that today is the ninth anniversary of this newsletter ([the first note](https://buttondown.com/justinwolfe/archive/11515/)) and am so thankful to you for reading, however long you've been reading. i know i write less now than i did in the past (these are challenging times for gratitude), but this year i hope to write more (i always hope to write more) and to clean up the archives and recompile a living ebook of the (`1798` and counting) issues so far. thanks again for all the time you've given my mind.

![380C3F50-C532-4E6A-978B-F2DC196BF3B3.JPG](/letters/images/117.jpg)
